'''''ithron''''' (pl. '''''ithryn''''') is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "[[Wizards|wizard]]".<ref name="Istari">{{UT|Istari}}</ref><ref>{{UT|Index}}</ref>

*[[Quenya]] ''[[istar]]''<ref name="Istari"/>
